oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Delegates Had Fun Too"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: UE Convention
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: UE conventioneers on a trolley in San Francisco. The UE held their convention in San Francisco in 1957, 1967 and 1975 during Wright's time as UE cartoonist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
